answers.answer: Just relax and try to get lots of sleep. Before the baby's are here!

question: I am 35 weeks pregnant with twins and tomorrow I have to be induced due to Preeclampsia. I'm only 1.5 cm dialted and have been for the last two weeks, is there anything I can be doing to get myself to dialte more today before I go in tomorrow to hopefully not have to be in labor allllllllll day and alllll night? Or should I just stay put and relax?
title: Being induced with twins!
